snippet: The Big 12 plans to join the Big Ten and the Pacific-12 in guaranteeing scholarships for athletes’ complete eligibility periods.
abstract: Big 12 announces that beginning in August it would guarantee multiyear scholarships; it joins the Big Ten and the Pacific-12 in guaranteeing scholarships for athletes’ complete eligibility periods.
lead_paragraph: The Big 12 plans to join the Big Ten and the Pacific-12 in guaranteeing scholarships for athletes’ complete eligibility periods.
